name: 吳和庭
objective:
本課程由老師指導學生選定題目，進行該題目之問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。專題範圍包含：1. 多媒體系統 2. 電腦網路 3. 軟體分析與設計 4. 影像與音訊處理 5. 微算機應用　等等
In this course, the instructor will guide the students to fulfill a special project through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report. The topics may include 1.Multimedia systems 2.Computer networks 3.Software analysis and design 4.Audio and video signal processing 5.Microprocessor-based applications
schedule: 由專題指導老師指定學習進度及內容
scorePolicy: 由專題指導老師依學生專題進度進行評分
materials: 由專題指導老師個別指定
